item.description:
Please register for this event here: http://ultralightstar...

March Entrepreneurs Forum:

SEO Strategies

Learn about SEO strategies for new web sites and creating content.

Thursday, Mar. 11 - 6:30PM at WorkBar Boston

This month's fourm will feature short presentations by leading SEO experts.

Eric Enge - President of of Stone Temple Consulting, will cover SEO for new web sites. Eric will talk about:

* When to start thinking about SEO
* How it affects site architecture and content management tool selection.
* The role of deep content
* The importance of site promotion

Larry Kim - Founder, VP, Marketing & Products WordStream, will discus SEO strategies for content. Larry will cover:

* How to find the right key words
* Blogging for SEO
* SEO strategies for your content

Please register for this event here: http://ultralightstar...
item.name: ULS Boston Forum - SEO Strategies
